TaxonIdentification.species_authority: (Torrey ex A. Gray) Shinners var . bisetosa

treatment.description: Plants 2–7(–10) cm. Leaves usually opposite; petioles 0–2 mm; blades ovate or ovate-lanceolate to lanceolate, margins entire or subserrate, faces glabrate; pappi of 2 bristles. 2n = 34.
treatment.discussion: Variety bisetosa appears to be restricted to a relatively small area in extreme southern Pecos County and adjacent Brewster County.
